Item.Name: abyssal blade
Item.Title: Abyssal Blade
Item.Description: Active: Overwhelm - Stuns a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.Passive: Damage Block - Makes the wielder block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Item.Lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
Item.Effects: BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE :40,BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED :20,BASH MELEE CHANCE :25%,BASH RANGED CHANCE :10%,BASH STUN DURATION :1.4,BASH BONUS DAMAGE :85,OVERWHELM STUN DURATION :2.0

Item.Name: aegis of the immortal
Item.Title: Aegis of the Immortal
Item.Description: Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
Item.Lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

Item.Name: aether lens
Item.Title: Aether Lens
Item.Description: Passive: Increases spell cast range by 200 and spell damage output by 5%
Item.Recipe: Ring of Health,Energy Booster,Recipe: Aether Lens

Item.Name: aghanims scepter
Item.Title: Aghanim's Scepter
Item.Description: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.
Item.Lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.
Item.Recipe: Ogre Club,Blade of Alacrity,Staff of Wizardry,Point Booster

Item.Name: animal courier
Item.Title: Animal Courier
Item.Description: Use: Deploy Courier - Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
Item.Lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

Item.Name: arcane boots
Item.Title: Arcane Boots
Item.Description: Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana to all allies in a 900 area around the hero.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Item.Lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

Item.Name: armlet of mordiggian
Item.Title: Armlet of Mordiggian
Item.Description: Active: Toggle Unholy Strength - When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage and +25 strength, but drains 45 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
Item.Lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
Item.Recipe: Blades of Attack,Helm of Iron Will,Gloves of Haste,Recipe: Armlet of Mordiggian

Item.Name: assault cuirass
Item.Title: Assault Cuirass
Item.Description: Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases the armor of nearby enemies.Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
Item.Lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
Item.Effects: AURA ATTACK SPEED :20,AURA ALLY BONUS ARMOR :5,AURA ENEMY ARMOR REDUCTION :-5

Item.Name: band of elvenskin
Item.Title: Band of Elvenskin
Item.Lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

Item.Name: battle fury
Item.Title: Battle Fury
Item.Description: Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 280 area around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.
Item.Lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
Item.Effects: CLEAVE DAMAGE :35%,QUELL MELEE DAMAGE :160%,QUELL RANGED DAMAGE :125%,CHOP TREE CAST RANGE :350,CHOP WARD CAST RANGE :450

Item.Name: belt of strength
Item.Title: Belt of Strength
Item.Lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

Item.Name: black king bar
Item.Title: Black King Bar
Item.Description: Active: Avatar - Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some abilities are able to disable through Avatar.
Item.Lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
Item.Recipe: Mithril Hammer,Ogre Club,Recipe: Black King Bar

Item.Name: blade mail
Item.Title: Blade Mail
Item.Description: Active: Damage Return - Reflects any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage. Lasts 4.5 seconds.
Item.Lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

Item.Name: blade of alacrity
Item.Title: Blade of Alacrity
Item.Lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

Item.Name: blades of attack
Item.Title: Blades of Attack
Item.Lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

Item.Name: blight stone
Item.Title: Blight Stone
Item.Description: Passive: Your attacks reduce target's armor for 8.0 seconds.Blight Stone is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Item.Name: blink dagger
Item.Title: Blink Dagger
Item.Description: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3.0 seconds.
Item.Lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

Item.Name: bloodstone
Item.Title: Bloodstone
Item.Description: Active: Pocket Deny - Instantly causes you to die.Passive: Bloodpact - Begins with 12 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second, and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.
Item.Lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

Item.Name: bloodthorn
Item.Title: Bloodthorn
Item.Description: Active: Silences a target for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30.0%. All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and land a crit on impact.Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
Item.Effects: CRITICAL CHANCE :20%,CRITICAL DAMAGE :175%,SILENCE INCREASED DAMAGE :30.0%,SILENCE DURATION :5.0,SILENCE CRITICAL DAMAGE :145.0%

Item.Name: boots of speed
Item.Title: Boots of Speed
Item.Description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Item.Lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

Item.Name: boots of travel
Item.Title: Boots of Travel
Item.Description: Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain. Upgradable to allow you to teleport to allied heroes.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Item.Lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.
Item.Recipe: Boots of Speed,Recipe: Boots of Travel

Item.Name: boots of travel level 2
Item.Title: Boots of Travel
Item.Description: Active: Teleport - Teleports you to any allied structure or unit, including heroes. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Item.Recipe: Recipe: Boots of Travel,Boots of Travel

Item.Name: bottle
Item.Title: Bottle
Item.Description: Use: Regenerate - Consumes a charge to restore Health and Mana over time. Healing stops if attacked. Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain. Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use, and are activated automatically after 2 minutes. If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier will move 30% slower.Hold Control to use Regenerate on an allied hero. Stored runes cannot be shared.
Item.Lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

Item.Name: bracer
Item.Title: Bracer
Item.Lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

Item.Name: broadsword
Item.Title: Broadsword
Item.Lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

Item.Name: buckler
Item.Title: Buckler
Item.Description: Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 armor to all allied units in a 900 radius. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.
Item.Lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

Item.Name: butterfly
Item.Title: Butterfly
Item.Description: Active: Flutter - Trade evasion for 35% additional movement speed for 4.0 seconds.Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
Item.Lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

Item.Name: chainmail
Item.Title: Chainmail
Item.Lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

Item.Name: cheese
Item.Title: Cheese
Item.Description: Use: Consume to instantly restore health and mana.
Item.Lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

Item.Name: circlet
Item.Title: Circlet
Item.Lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

Item.Name: clarity
Item.Title: Clarity
Item.Description: Use: Restores mana to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
Item.Lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

Item.Name: claymore
Item.Title: Claymore
Item.Lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

Item.Name: cloak
Item.Title: Cloak
Item.Lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

Item.Name: crimson guard
Item.Title: Crimson Guard
Item.Description: Active: Guard - Grant nearby allied heroes a 100% chance to block 55 damage from each incoming attack, along with 2 armor. Lasts 10 seconds.Passive: Damage Block - Makes the wielder block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Item.Lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.
Item.Effects: BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE :32,BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED :16,GUARD ARMOR :2,GUARD DURATION :10,GUARD RADIUS :900,GUARD DAMAGE BLOCK :55

Item.Name: crystalys
Item.Title: Crystalys
Item.Description: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
Item.Lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

Item.Name: daedalus
Item.Title: Daedalus
Item.Description: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
Item.Lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

Item.Name: dagon
Item.Title: Dagon
Item.Description: Active: Energy Burst - Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
Item.Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

Item.Name: dagon level 2
Item.Title: Dagon (level 2)
Item.Description: Active: Energy Burst - Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
Item.Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

Item.Name: dagon level 3
Item.Title: Dagon (level 3)
Item.Description: Active: Energy Burst - Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
Item.Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

Item.Name: dagon level 4
Item.Title: Dagon (level 4)
Item.Description: Active: Energy Burst - Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
Item.Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

Item.Name: dagon level 5
Item.Title: Dagon (level 5)
Item.Description: Active: Energy Burst - Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.
Item.Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

Item.Name: demon edge
Item.Title: Demon Edge
Item.Lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

Item.Name: desolator
Item.Title: Desolator
Item.Description: Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
Item.Lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

Item.Name: diffusal blade
Item.Title: Diffusal Blade
Item.Description: Active: Purge - If cast on an enemy, removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4.0 seconds. If cast on an ally, Purge removes most debuffs.Passive: Manabreak - Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals the same amount in physical damage. Burns 20 mana per attack from melee illusions and 10 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.Upgradable.
Item.Lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
Item.Recipe: Robe of the Magi,Blade of Alacrity,Blade of Alacrity,Recipe: Diffusal Blade

Item.Name: diffusal blade level 2
Item.Title: Diffusal Blade (level 2)
Item.Description: Active: Purge - If cast on an enemy, removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4.0 seconds. If cast on an ally, Purge removes most debuffs.Passive: Manabreak - Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals the same amount in physical damage. Burns 20 mana per attack from melee illusions and 10 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
Item.Lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

Item.Name: divine rapier
Item.Title: Divine Rapier
Item.Description: Drops on death. Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
Item.Lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

Item.Name: dragon lance
Item.Title: Dragon Lance
Item.Description: Passive: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
Item.Recipe: Band of Elvenskin,Band of Elvenskin,Ogre Club

Item.Name: drum of endurance
Item.Title: Drum of Endurance
Item.Description: Active: Endurance - Gives bonus +25 attack speed and +13% movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus attack and movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.
Item.Lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.
Item.Effects: AURA ATTACK SPEED :5,AURA MOVE SPEED :5%,ENDURANCE ATTACK SPEED :25,ENDURANCE MOVE SPEED :13%,ENDURANCE DURATION :6,AURA/ENDURANCE RADIUS :900
Item.Recipe: Ring of Regen,Bracer,Recipe: Drum of Endurance,Wind Lace

Item.Name: dust of appearance
Item.Title: Dust of Appearance
Item.Description: Use: Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

Item.Name: eaglesong
Item.Title: Eaglesong
Item.Lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

Item.Name: echo sabre
Item.Title: Echo Sabre
Item.Description: Passive: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 0.6 second 100% movement and attack speed slow on each strike.

Item.Name: enchanted mango
Item.Title: Enchanted Mango
Item.Description: Use: Consume the mango to instantly restore 150 mana.Hold Control to use Enchanted Mango on an allied hero.
Item.Lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

Item.Name: energy booster
Item.Title: Energy Booster
Item.Lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

Item.Name: ethereal blade
Item.Title: Ethereal Blade
Item.Description: Active: Ether Blast - Launches a projectile which converts the target to ethereal form, increasing any incoming magic damage they take, while rendering them immune to physical damage and unable to attack. Can be cast on self. If the target is an enemy, it is also slowed, and takes 2.0x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage.Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
Item.Lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
Item.Effects: BLAST ENEMY MOVE SLOW :-80%,BLAST ENEMY DURATION :3.0,BLAST ALLY/SELF DURATION :4.0,INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE :-40%

Item.Name: euls scepter of divinity
Item.Title: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
Item.Description: Active: Cyclone - Sweeps a target unit up into cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
Item.Lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
Item.Recipe: Staff of Wizardry,Void Stone,Recipe: Eul's Scepter of Divinity,Wind Lace

Item.Name: eye of skadi
Item.Title: Eye of Skadi
Item.Description: Passive: Cold Attack - Each attack slows the movement and attack speed of the target. The duration of the slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.
Item.Lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.
Item.Effects: COLD MOVE SLOW :-35%,COLD ATTACK SLOW :-45,COLD MELEE DURATION :5.0,COLD RANGED DURATION :2.5
Item.Recipe: Ultimate Orb,Ultimate Orb,Point Booster,Orb of Venom

Item.Name: faerie fire
Item.Title: Faerie Fire
Item.Description: Use: Consume the Faerie Fire to instantly restore 75 HP

Item.Name: flying courier
Item.Title: Flying Courier
Item.Description: Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.Requires a deployed Animal Courier.

Item.Name: force staff
Item.Title: Force Staff
Item.Description: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to instantly cast Force on yourself.
Item.Lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
Item.Recipe: Staff of Wizardry,Ring of Regen,Recipe: Force Staff

Item.Name: gauntlets of strength
Item.Title: Gauntlets of Strength
Item.Lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

Item.Name: gem of true sight
Item.Title: Gem of True Sight
Item.Description: Passive: True Sight - Adds the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within its carrier's range.Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
Item.Lore: Not one thrall creature of the depths, Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep, Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular, Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

Item.Name: ghost scepter
Item.Title: Ghost Scepter
Item.Description: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form, becoming immune to physical damage, yet unable to attack and taking 40% extra magic damage.Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ghost Form.
Item.Lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

Item.Name: glimmer cape
Item.Title: Glimmer Cape
Item.Description: Active: Glimmer - After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit. Can be cast while channelling.
Item.Lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.
Item.Effects: GLIMMER FADE TIME :0.6,GLIMMER MAGIC RESISTANCE :45%,GLIMMER DURATION :5.0

Item.Name: gloves of haste
Item.Title: Gloves of Haste
Item.Lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

Item.Name: guardian greaves
Item.Title: Guardian Greaves
Item.Description: Active: Mend - Restores 250 health and 160 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative buffs from the caster.Passive: Guardian Aura - Provides nearby allies with 4 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 15 health regeneration and 15 armor.
Item.Lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.
Item.Effects: AURA HEALTH REGEN :4,AURA ARMOR :2,AURA BOOST HEALTH REGEN :15,AURA BOOST ARMOR :15,AURA BOOST THRESHOLD :20%,MEND HEAL :250,MEND MANA RESTORE :160,AURA/MEND RADIUS :900

Item.Name: hand of midas
Item.Title: Hand of Midas
Item.Description: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience. Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.
Item.Lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
Item.Recipe: Gloves of Haste,Recipe: Hand of Midas

Item.Name: headdress
Item.Title: Headdress
Item.Description: Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores health to allies in a 900 unit radius.Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
Item.Lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

Item.Name: healing salve
Item.Title: Healing Salve
Item.Description: Use: Restores health to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
Item.Lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

Item.Name: heart of tarrasque
Item.Title: Heart of Tarrasque
Item.Description: Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.
Item.Lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

Item.Name: heavens halberd
Item.Title: Heaven's Halberd
Item.Description: Active: Disarm - Prevents a target from attacking. Lasts 3.0 seconds on melee targets, and 5.5 seconds on ranged targets.Passive: Lesser Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4.0 seconds.Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
Item.Lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
Item.Effects: MAIM CHANCE :20%,MOVEMENT SLOW MELEE :-20%,ATTACK SLOW MELEE :-20,MOVEMENT SLOW RANGED :-10%,ATTACK SLOW RANGED :-10,MAIM DURATION :4.0,DISARM RANGED DURATION :5.5,DISARM MELEE DURATION :3.0,DISARM CAST RANGE :600

Item.Name: helm of iron will
Item.Title: Helm of Iron Will
Item.Lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

Item.Name: helm of the dominator
Item.Title: Helm of the Dominator
Item.Description: Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 350. If a dominated creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
Item.Lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

Item.Name: hood of defiance
Item.Title: Hood of Defiance
Item.Description: Active: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage.
Item.Lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

Item.Name: hurricane pike
Item.Title: Hurricane Pike
Item.Description: Active: When used on an enemy, it pushes you both away from each other 450 units each, and allows you to attack the target without range restrictions for 4 attacks for a maximum of 5.0 seconds. Grants 100 Attack Speed during the attacks. Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.Passive: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
Item.Effects: UNLIMITED RANGE DURATION :5.0,CAST RANGE ON ENEMY :400,UNLIMITED RANGE ATTACKS :4

Item.Name: hyperstone
Item.Title: Hyperstone
Item.Lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

Item.Name: infused raindrop
Item.Title: Infused Raindrop
Item.Description: Passive: Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 50 damage. Comes with 5 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappear.

Item.Name: iron branch
Item.Title: Iron Branch
Item.Description: Active: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.
Item.Lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

Item.Name: iron talon
Item.Title: Iron Talon
Item.Description: Active: Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove 40% of its current HP.Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.
Item.Effects: QUELL MELEE DAMAGE :140%,QUELL RANGED DAMAGE :115%,CAST RANGE :350,CAST RANGE ON WARDS :450
Item.Recipe: Quelling Blade,Ring of Protection,Recipe: Iron Talon

Item.Name: javelin
Item.Title: Javelin
Item.Description: Passive: Pierce - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage.
Item.Lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

Item.Name: linkens sphere
Item.Title: Linken's Sphere
Item.Description: Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 13.0 seconds.Active: Transfer Spellblock - Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit.
Item.Lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

Item.Name: lotus orb
Item.Title: Lotus Orb
Item.Description: Active: Echo Shell - Applies a shield to the target unit which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Dispels negative buffs when applied.
Item.Lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

Item.Name: maelstrom
Item.Title: Maelstrom
Item.Description: Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets, dealing 120 magical damage to each.Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
Item.Lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
Item.Effects: CHAIN CHANCE :25%,CHAIN DAMAGE :120,CHAIN TARGETS :4,CHAIN LEAP RADIUS :900

Item.Name: magic stick
Item.Title: Magic Stick
Item.Description: Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 10) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
Item.Lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

Item.Name: magic wand
Item.Title: Magic Wand
Item.Description: Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 17) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
Item.Lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

Item.Name: manta style
Item.Title: Manta Style
Item.Description: Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee heroes have a 30 second cooldown on this ability, while for Ranged heroes the cooldown is 45 seconds.Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage.Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
Item.Lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
Item.Effects: NUMBER OF IMAGES :2,IMAGE DURATION :20,MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE :33%,MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN :350%,RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE :28%,RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN :400%

Item.Name: mantle of intelligence
Item.Title: Mantle of Intelligence
Item.Lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

Item.Name: mask of madness
Item.Title: Mask of Madness
Item.Description: Active: Berserk - Gives 100 attack speed and 17% movement speed, but causes you to take extra 25% damage. Lasts 12.0 seconds.Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
Item.Lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
Item.Effects: LIFESTEAL :20%,BERSERK ATTACK SPEED :100,BERSERK MOVE SPEED :17%,BERSERK ADDED DAMAGE TAKEN :25%,BERSERK DURATION :12.0

Item.Name: medallion of courage
Item.Title: Medallion of Courage
Item.Description: Active: Valor - If cast on an ally, increases their armor while reducing the caster's. If cast on an enemy, reduces the armor of both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target magic immune enemies. Armor reduction is halved against Roshan.
Item.Lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.
Item.Effects: VALOR ARMOR REDUCTION :-7,VALOR DURATION :7,VALOR CAST RANGE :1000

Item.Name: mekansm
Item.Title: Mekansm
Item.Description: Active: Restore - Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius.Passive: Mekansm Aura - Grants 4 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius.Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
Item.Lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
Item.Effects: AURA HEALTH REGEN :4,RESTORE HEAL :250,RESTORE ARMOR :2,RESTORE ARMOR DURATION :25,AURA/RESTORE RADIUS :900

Item.Name: mithril hammer
Item.Title: Mithril Hammer
Item.Lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

Item.Name: mjollnir
Item.Title: Mjollnir
Item.Description: Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a 20% chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets, dealing 150 magical damage to each.Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
Item.Lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
Item.Effects: STATIC DURATION :15.0,STATIC CHANCE :20%,STATIC DAMAGE :200,STATIC RELEASE RADIUS :900,CHAIN CHANCE :25%,CHAIN DAMAGE :150,CHAIN TARGETS :12,CHAIN LEAP RADIUS :900

Item.Name: monkey king bar
Item.Title: Monkey King Bar
Item.Description: Passive: Mini-Bash - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun.Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.
Item.Lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

Item.Name: moon shard
Item.Title: Moon Shard
Item.Description: Use: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed. Does not stack.Passive: Shade Sight - Grants 250 bonus night vision.
Item.Lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.
Item.Effects: SHADE BONUS NIGHT VISION :250,CONSUME ATTACK SPEED :60

Item.Name: morbid mask
Item.Title: Morbid Mask
Item.Description: Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
Item.Lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

Item.Name: mystic staff
Item.Title: Mystic Staff
Item.Lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

Item.Name: necronomicon
Item.Title: Necronomicon
Item.Description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3. Upgradable.
Item.Lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
Item.Effects: WARRIOR HEALTH :700,WARRIOR DAMAGE :45,WARRIOR MANA BREAK :25,WARRIOR LAST WILL DMG :550,ARCHER HEALTH :700,ARCHER DAMAGE :60,ARCHER MANA BURN :125,ARCHER AURA SPEED :5%
Item.Recipe: Belt of Strength,Staff of Wizardry,Recipe: Necronomicon

Item.Name: necronomicon level 2
Item.Title: Necronomicon (level 2)
Item.Description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3. Upgradable.
Item.Lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
Item.Effects: WARRIOR HEALTH :800,WARRIOR DAMAGE :60,WARRIOR MANA BREAK :50,WARRIOR LAST WILL DMG :675,ARCHER HEALTH :800,ARCHER DAMAGE :90,ARCHER MANA BURN :175,ARCHER AURA SPEED :7%

Item.Name: necronomicon level 3
Item.Title: Necronomicon (level 3)
Item.Description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3.
Item.Lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
Item.Effects: WARRIOR HEALTH :900,WARRIOR DAMAGE :75,WARRIOR MANA BREAK :75,WARRIOR LAST WILL DMG :800,ARCHER HEALTH :900,ARCHER DAMAGE :120,ARCHER MANA BURN :225,ARCHER AURA SPEED :9%

Item.Name: null talisman
Item.Title: Null Talisman
Item.Lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

Item.Name: oblivion staff
Item.Title: Oblivion Staff
Item.Lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

Item.Name: observer and sentry wards
Item.Title: Observer and Sentry Wards
Item.Description: Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.Use: Plant the currently active ward to keep watch over an area. Observer Wards reveal their surrounding area to your team. Sentry Wards grant True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range.
Item.Lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.
Item.Effects: OBSERVER VISION RANGE :1600,OBSERVER DURATION (MINUTES) :6,SENTRY TRUE SIGHT RANGE :850,SENTRY DURATION (MINUTES) :4

Item.Name: observer ward
Item.Title: Observer Ward
Item.Description: Use: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives vision of its surrounding area to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.
Item.Lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

Item.Name: octarine core
Item.Title: Octarine Core
Item.Description: Passive: Cooldown Reduction - Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.Passive: Spell Lifesteal - A percentage of damage caused by spells is returned to the caster as health.
Item.Lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.
Item.Effects: COOLDOWN REDUCTION :25%,HERO SPELL LIFESTEAL :25.0%,CREEP SPELL LIFESTEAL :5.0%

Item.Name: ogre club
Item.Title: Ogre Club
Item.Lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

Item.Name: orb of venom
Item.Title: Orb of Venom
Item.Description: Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing movement based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Item.Lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
Item.Effects: POISON DAMAGE PER SECOND :3.0,POISON MELEE SLOW :-12%,POISON RANGED SLOW :-4%,POISON DURATION :4.0

Item.Name: orchid malevolence
Item.Title: Orchid Malevolence
Item.Description: Active: Soul Burn - Silences the target unit for 5.0 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30.0% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.
Item.Lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
Item.Effects: SOUL BURN INCREASED DAMAGE :30.0%,SOUL BURN DURATION :5.0

Item.Name: perseverance
Item.Title: Perseverance
Item.Lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

Item.Name: phase boots
Item.Title: Phase Boots
Item.Description: Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. The increased movement speed is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Item.Lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
Item.Effects: PHASE MOVE BOOST MELEE :24%,PHASE MOVE BOOST RANGED :20%,PHASE DURATION :2.5
Item.Recipe: Blades of Attack,Blades of Attack,Boots of Speed

Item.Name: pipe of insight
Item.Title: Pipe of Insight
Item.Description: Active: Barrier - Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all allies in a 900 radius.Passive: Insight Aura - Gives allied units 4 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance in a 900 radius.
Item.Lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
Item.Effects: AURA HEALTH REGEN :4,AURA MAGIC RESISTANCE :10%,AURA RADIUS :900,BARRIER SPELL BLOCK :400,BARRIER DURATION :12,BARRIER CAST RADIUS :900
Item.Recipe: Recipe: Pipe of Insight,Headdress,Hood of Defiance

Item.Name: platemail
Item.Title: Platemail
Item.Lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

Item.Name: point booster
Item.Title: Point Booster
Item.Lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

Item.Name: poor mans shield
Item.Title: Poor Man's Shield
Item.Description: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a 53% chance to block damage from creeps.
Item.Lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
Item.Effects: MELEE DAMAGE BLOCK :20,RANGED DAMAGE BLOCK :10,CREEP BLOCK CHANCE :53%
Item.Recipe: Slippers of Agility,Slippers of Agility,Stout Shield

Item.Name: power treads
Item.Title: Power Treads
Item.Description: Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack, nor does the attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads.
Item.Lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
Item.Recipe: Belt of Strength,Gloves of Haste,Boots of Speed

Item.Name: quarterstaff
Item.Title: Quarterstaff
Item.Lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

Item.Name: quelling blade
Item.Title: Quelling Blade
Item.Description: Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.
Item.Lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
Item.Effects: QUELL MELEE DAMAGE :140%,QUELL RANGED DAMAGE :115%,CHOP TREE CAST RANGE :350,CHOP WARD CAST RANGE :450

Item.Name: radiance
Item.Title: Radiance
Item.Description: Active: Toggle Burn - When active, scorches nearby enemies for 50 damage per second and blinds them, causing them to miss 17% of their attacks.
Item.Lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.
Item.Effects: BURN DAMAGE PER SECOND :50,BURN MISS CHANCE :17%,BURN RADIUS :700

Item.Name: reaver
Item.Title: Reaver
Item.Lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

Item.Name: refresher orb
Item.Title: Refresher Orb
Item.Description: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
Item.Lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

Item.Name: ring of aquila
Item.Title: Ring of Aquila
Item.Description: Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect.Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
Item.Lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

Item.Name: ring of basilius
Item.Title: Ring of Basilius
Item.Description: Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect.Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
Item.Lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

Item.Name: ring of health
Item.Title: Ring of Health
Item.Lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

Item.Name: ring of protection
Item.Title: Ring of Protection
Item.Lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

Item.Name: ring of regen
Item.Title: Ring of Regen
Item.Lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

Item.Name: river vial chrome
Item.Title: River Vial: Chrome
Item.Description: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into liquid chrome for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Item.Name: river vial dry
Item.Title: River Vial: Dry
Item.Description: Pour this serum into the river to dry up the water for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect . Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Item.Name: river vial electrified
Item.Title: Dragon Lance
Item.Description: Passive: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

Item.Name: river vial potion
Item.Title: River Vial: Potion
Item.Description: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into a purple bubbling potion for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Item.Name: river vial slime
Item.Title: Faerie Fire
Item.Description: Use: Consume the Faerie Fire to instantly restore 75 HP

Item.Name: robe of the magi
Item.Title: Robe of the Magi
Item.Lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

Item.Name: rod of atos
Item.Title: Rod of Atos
Item.Description: Active: Cripple - Slows the target's movement speed.
Item.Lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.
Item.Recipe: Staff of Wizardry,Staff of Wizardry,Vitality Booster

Item.Name: sacred relic
Item.Title: Sacred Relic
Item.Lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

Item.Name: sages mask
Item.Title: Sage's Mask
Item.Lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

Item.Name: sange
Item.Title: Sange
Item.Description: Passive: Lesser Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4.0 seconds.
Item.Lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
Item.Effects: MAIM CHANCE :20%,MOVEMENT SLOW MELEE :-20%,ATTACK SLOW MELEE :-20,MOVEMENT SLOW RANGED :-10%,ATTACK SLOW RANGED :-10,MAIM DURATION :4.0

Item.Name: sange and yasha
Item.Title: Sange and Yasha
Item.Description: Passive: Greater Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5.0 seconds.Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
Item.Lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.
Item.Effects: MAIM CHANCE :30%,MOVEMENT SLOW MELEE :-26%,ATTACK SLOW MELEE :-26,MOVEMENT SLOW RANGED :-13%,ATTACK SLOW RANGED :-13,MAIM DURATION :5.0

Item.Name: satanic
Item.Title: Satanic
Item.Description: Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.5 seconds.Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
Item.Lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

Item.Name: scythe of vyse
Item.Title: Scythe of Vyse
Item.Description: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Instantly destroys illusions.
Item.Lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

Item.Name: sentry ward
Item.Title: Sentry Ward
Item.Description: Use: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range. Lasts 4 minutes.Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.
Item.Lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

Item.Name: shadow amulet
Item.Title: Shadow Amulet
Item.Description: Active: Fade - Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero after a 1.5 second fade time. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

Item.Name: shadow blade
Item.Title: Shadow Blade
Item.Description: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 14.0 seconds.
Item.Lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

Item.Name: shivas guard
Item.Title: Shiva's Guard
Item.Description: Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces the attack speed of all enemies in a 900 radius.Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
Item.Lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
Item.Effects: AURA ATTACK SLOW :-45,BLAST DAMAGE :200,BLAST MOVEMENT SLOW :-40%,BLAST SLOW DURATION :4.0,BLAST RADIUS :900

Item.Name: silver edge
Item.Title: Silver Edge
Item.Description: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move 20% faster and can move through units. Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 225 bonus damage to the target, disable their passive abilities, and reduce their damage output.
Item.Lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.
Item.Effects: SHADOW WALK DURATION :14.0,BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE :225,ENEMY DAMAGE REDUCTION :-50%,REDUCTION DURATION :5.0

Item.Name: skull basher
Item.Title: Skull Basher
Item.Description: Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
Item.Lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
Item.Effects: BASH MELEE CHANCE :25%,BASH RANGED CHANCE :10%,BASH STUN DURATION :1.4,BASH BONUS DAMAGE :85

Item.Name: slippers of agility
Item.Title: Slippers of Agility
Item.Lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

Item.Name: smoke of deceit
Item.Title: Smoke of Deceit
Item.Description: Use: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisibility and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.

Item.Name: solar crest
Item.Title: Solar Crest
Item.Description: Active: Shine - Temporarily removes the armor and evasion from Solar Crest. When cast on an ally it grants them 10 armor and 25% evasion. When cast on an enemy, it removes 10 of their armor and blinds them, causing them to miss 25% of their attacks. Cannot target magic immune enemies. Armor reduction is halved against Roshan.
Item.Lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.
Item.Effects: SHINE ALLY BONUS ARMOR :10,SHINE ALLY EVASION :25%,SHINE ENEMY ARMOR LOSS :-10,SHINE ENEMY MISS CHANCE :25%,SHINE DURATION :7,SHINE CAST RANGE :1000

Item.Name: soul booster
Item.Title: Soul Booster
Item.Lore: Regain lost courage.

Item.Name: soul ring
Item.Title: Soul Ring
Item.Description: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.
Item.Lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.
Item.Recipe: Ring of Regen,Sage's Mask,Recipe: Soul Ring

Item.Name: staff of wizardry
Item.Title: Staff of Wizardry
Item.Lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

Item.Name: stout shield
Item.Title: Stout Shield
Item.Description: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Item.Lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
Item.Effects: MELEE DAMAGE BLOCK :16,RANGED DAMAGE BLOCK :8,BLOCK CHANCE :50%

Item.Name: talisman of evasion
Item.Title: Talisman of Evasion
Item.Description: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
Item.Lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

Item.Name: tango
Item.Title: Tango
Item.Description: Use: Eat a Tree or Ward - Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health.Comes with 4 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.
Item.Lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.
Item.Effects: EAT TREE HEALTH RESTORED :115,EAT WARD HEALTH RESTORED :230,EAT WARD CAST RANGE :450,HEAL DURATION :16.0

Item.Name: tango shared
Item.Title: Tango (Shared)
Item.Description: Use: Eat a Tree or Ward - Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health.
Item.Lore: Om nom nom.
Item.Effects: EAT TREE HEALTH RESTORED :115,EAT WARD HEALTH RESTORED :230,EAT WARD CAST RANGE :450,HEAL DURATION :16.0

Item.Name: tome of knowledge
Item.Title: Tome of Knowledge
Item.Description: Use: Grants you experience.

Item.Name: town portal scroll
Item.Title: Town Portal Scroll
Item.Description: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

Item.Name: tranquil boots
Item.Title: Tranquil Boots
Item.Description: Passive: Break - Whenever you attack or are attacked, the health regeneration and 30 Movement Speed are lost for 13 seconds.
Item.Lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
Item.Recipe: Ring of Protection,Ring of Regen,Boots of Speed

Item.Name: ultimate orb
Item.Title: Ultimate Orb
Item.Lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

Item.Name: urn of shadows
Item.Title: Urn of Shadows
Item.Description: Active: Soul Release - Heals health over time to friendly units, but deals pure damage over time to enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected ally takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
Item.Lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
Item.Effects: RELEASE ALLY TOTAL HEAL :400,RELEASE ENEMY TOTAL DAMAGE :150,SOUL RELEASE DURATION :8.0,SOUL RELEASE CAST RANGE :950
Item.Recipe: Gauntlets of Strength,Gauntlets of Strength,Sage's Mask,Recipe: Urn of Shadows

Item.Name: vanguard
Item.Title: Vanguard
Item.Description: Passive: Damage Block - Makes the wielder block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Item.Lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

Item.Name: veil of discord
Item.Title: Veil of Discord
Item.Description: Active: Magic Weakness - Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 16.0 seconds.
Item.Lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.
Item.Effects: INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE :-25%,MAGIC WEAKNESS RADIUS :600,MAGIC WEAKNESS DURATION :16.0
Item.Recipe: Helm of Iron Will,Null Talisman,Null Talisman,Recipe: Veil of Discord

Item.Name: vitality booster
Item.Title: Vitality Booster
Item.Lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

Item.Name: vladmirs offering
Item.Title: Vladmir's Offering
Item.Description: Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants lifesteal, health regeneration, mana regeneration, bonus attack damage, and armor to allies in a 900 radius. The lifesteal percentage is based on whether the hero affected by the aura is melee or ranged.Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
Item.Lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
Item.Effects: AURA HEALTH REGEN :3,AURA MANA REGEN :0.8,AURA BONUS ARMOR :4,AURA BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE :15%,AURA MELEE LIFESTEAL :15%,AURA RANGED LIFESTEAL :10%,AURA RADIUS :900
Item.Recipe: Morbid Mask,Recipe: Vladmir's Offering,Ring of Basilius,Headdress

Item.Name: void stone
Item.Title: Void Stone
Item.Lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

Item.Name: wind lace
Item.Title: Wind Lace
Item.Description: Passive: Gives increased movement speed.

Item.Name: wraith band
Item.Title: Wraith Band
Item.Lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

Item.Name: yasha
Item.Title: Yasha
Item.Description: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
Item.Lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
Item.Recipe: Band of Elvenskin,Blade of Alacrity,Recipe: Yasha
